title: There’s No Hollywood Loophole for Gun Safety
sub_head: Alec Baldwin should take responsibility and promote new safety standards.
body:
Regarding Matthew Hennessey’s op-ed “The Truth Behind Alec Baldwin’s Gun” (Nov. 15): If someone handed you a gun and said it wasn’t loaded, would you aim it at your daughter and pull the trigger? Of course not, but that is exactly what Mr. Baldwin did—but it was someone else’s daughter. He should take responsibility and promote new safety standards.
Steven Kahn
